|| [BrainRegionPCA_NC_SPL_SA PCA.NC.SPL.SA] || Somatosensory Association Cortex || Neocortex || Locating objects in space || PE, somatosensory, guiding movement by providing<BR>information about limb position ||
|| [BrainRegionPCA_NC_SPL_PF PCA.NC.SPL.PF] || Rostral Precuneus || Neocortex || Spatial orientation, representation of the self || rostral, 7B=PF, heavy somatosensory input ||
|| [BrainRegionPCA_NC_SPL_PG PCA.NC.SPL.PG] || Caudal Precuneus || Neocortex || Controlling spatially guided behavior with respect to visual and tactile<BR>information || caudal, 7A=PG+Opt ||
|| [BrainRegionPCA_NC_PO_PCC PCA.NC.PO.PCC] || Precentral Cortex || Neocortex || Gustatory cortical area ||  ||
|| [BrainRegionPCA_NC_IPS_PEF PCA.NC.IPS.PEF] || Posterior Eye Field || Neocortex || Reflexive saccade triggering ||  ||
|| [BrainRegionPCA_NC_IPS_VIP PCA.NC.IPS.VIP] || Ventral Intraparietal Sulcus || Neocortex || Merge visual, somatosensory, auditory, and vestibular senses || Represent space in head-centered reference frame ||
|| [BrainRegionPCA_NC_IPS_AIP PCA.NC.IPS.AIP] || Anterior Intraparietal Sulcus || Neocortex || Represent shape, size, and orientation of objects to be grasped || Both to viewed and remembered stimuli, grasping and<BR>manipulating objects through motor and visual<BR>inputs ||
|| [BrainRegionPCA_NC_MPL_RSC PCA.NC.MPL.RSC] || Retrosplenial Cortex || Neocortex || Processing of emotionally salient stimuli ||  ||
|| [BrainRegionPCA_NC_MPL_PCG PCA.NC.MPL.PCG] || Posterior Cingulate Cortex || Neocortex || Self-awareness, pain and episodic memory retrieval ||  ||
|| [BrainRegionPCA_NC_IPL_MST PCA.NC.IPL.MST] || Medial Superior Temporal Area || Neocortex || Image stabilization, predictive target tracking || PG, Ventro-dorsal stream ||
|| [BrainRegionPCA_NC_IPL_SMW PCA.NC.IPL.SMW] || Supramarginal Wernike Cortex || Neocortex || Phonological and articulatory processing of words || PF, Computing sound of word, tactile learning and<BR>memory ||
|| [BrainRegionPCA_FD_TH_RIL PCA.FD.TH.RIL] || Rostral Intralaminar Nucleus of Thalamus || Excitatory Nucleus || Stimulate memory-guided response || from brainstem to SPL.SA ||
|| [BrainRegionPCA_FD_TH_LD PCA.FD.TH.LD] || Lateral Dorsal Nucleus of Thalamus || Excitatory Nucleus || Head direction, spatial learning || From RSP L5,6 BA17,18, RT, LGN ||
|| [BrainRegionPCA_FD_TH_LP PCA.FD.TH.LP] || Lateral Posterior Nucleus of Thalamus || Excitatory Nucleus || Visual association cortex || From superior colliculus, pretectum ||
|| [BrainRegionPCA_FD_TH_SG PCA.FD.TH.SG] || Suprageniculate Nucleus of Thalamus || Excitatory Nucleus || Spatial coding of auditory information || From tectum, somatic sensations ||
|| [BrainRegionPCA_FD_TH_PO PCA.FD.TH.PO] || Posterior Nucleus of Thalamus || Excitatory Nucleus || Somatic markers for spatial coding || To parietal association cortices ||
